def_cn: (为迅速解决某问题采取的)应急行动，极端政策
def_en: You can refer to the use of extreme policies or actions to solve a particular problem quickly as shock therapy .

def_cn: (通过电击来治疗精神病患者的)休克疗法，电击治疗
def_en: Shock therapy is a way of treating mentally ill patients by passing an electric current through their brain.
